project-basis: Using Game maker and Easy draw.
project-challenges: We were new to both of these programs (and languages) with the exception of Izzy who knew a little bit about Game maker!
project-future-plans: We can't say for sure, but we hope to fully develop it in the future!
project-purpose: This app provides an enjoyable and unique gaming experience to all!
project-inspiration: We were inspired by years of being fans of both in-life and e-ping pong!
project-lessons-learned: Teamwork gets you through long hours.
project-accomplishments: We're proud of making an awesome and fun app!
project-subtitle: We put a modern spin on your classic ping pong game app with upgrades, new features, and a cool design!
